name: Rivers 2 Multiple Choice Quiz | Rivers | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which one of the world's great rivers flows north?
questions.explanation:
Nile.

	The Nile is the longest river in the world.

questions.text: Which river pours the most water into the ocean?
questions.explanation:
Amazon.

	It's the river with the highest volume of water. It is second in length to the Nile.

questions.text: On which river is Philadelphia located?
questions.explanation:
Delaware.

	The Delaware River rises in the western slopes of the Catskill mountains in New York.

questions.text: Which of the following rivers is not located in Australia?
questions.explanation:
Loire.

	The Loire is the longest river in France.

questions.text: On what river would you find West Point?
questions.explanation:
Hudson.

	The Hudson rises in the Adirondack mountains and flows south to New York City. West Point is between Albany and New York City.

questions.text: What is the longest river in Europe?
Mark Twain wrote about life on what river?
What is the name of Rome's river?
questions.explanation:
Tiber.

	The third longest river in Italy.

questions.text: Africa's Zambezi and Limpopo rivers empty into which ocean?
On what river is Louisville located?
questions.explanation:
Ohio.

	Flows from Pittsburgh to the Mississippi at Cairo Illinois.
